Variance of the log-transformed hazard estimate

var_hat.Rd

Variance of the log-transformed hazard estimate

Usage

var_hat(lambda, risk_set, fh, n)

Arguments

lambda

hazard rate

risk_set

\(hat{U}\)

fh

\(hat{f}\)

n

sample size (or number of timepoints)

Value

a scalar

Author

lcgodoy

On this page

Developed by Lucas da Cunha Godoy, Jackson Lautier.
